_source.name: Vaidyanath
_source.description: Vaidyanath, a health and fitness based web and print magazine which promotes healthcare startups and entrepreneurs and other health sector professional by featuring them on its platform.

_source.name: Variance.AI
_source.description:
Variance.AI is a fitness company. 80% of the members don’t use gym, yet they pay $30 to $125/month. Attrition is linked with discouraging results and lack of engagement. Traditional gym users don’t know proper exercise regimen. Members prefer workout regimens that are fun, customizable and social. 

They specialize in providing customized fitness solutions using Artificial Intelligence. Travi and Gruvi are our flagship products for fitness.

_source.name: VASS Software and Solutions
_source.description:
Vass Softwares and Solutions Private Limited is a Chennai based healthcare information management systems product Company. They provide comprehensive and global standard Solutions in the areas of HIMS,BIG DATA and Analytics, Their IT consulting services are geared towards increasing business performance and reducing IT costs. Their approach is consultative, their execution is strategic, their processes are agile, and their focus is on delivering sophisticated IT solutions for their clients.

Vass Softwares and Solutions Private Limited was founded with the core mission of delivering innovative technology solutions to healthcare service providers enabling value addition to its client’s business processes and systems. They help Businesses Bridge the gap between their business and information technology. Vass Softwares will provide customized solutions for different specialties with built in best treatment practices in each specialty for Healthcare service providers.

_source.name: Ved World
_source.description:
The Vedas are the oldest and most sacred written texts on our planet. It contains divine spiritual knowledge that encompasses all aspects of life. It has answers to questions like how the universe is formed and offers solutions to grave problems of the modern world like global warming, harmful radiations, pollution, population growth, unhealthy lifestyle etc. The Vedic rituals have been scientifically proven to purify the surroundings and increase the overall influx of cosmic energy at the given place.

This thought that Vedas are the most primordial source of knowledge and wisdom throughout the universe emerged as an idea to create the company VED WORLD.  The motto of Ved World is to spread knowledge to the whole world for the benefit of entire mankind. The logo of Ved World , which is the triquetra symbol is a three cornered , interlaced with a circle . It comprises of 3 intersecting Vesica Pisces . The holy logo of Ved world , depicts 3 basic elements – air , water and earth .The unique products and treatments by skilled professionals ensure growth and progress.

_source.name: Visit
_source.description: Visit is an AI-driven chatbot to help diagnose your health condition within minutes. The chatbot helps users understand their medical condition, read further and then connects them (over video/phone/chat) to the right physician or specialist based on the condition for further prescriptions/counselling. It also tracks user activity, sleep and fitness data to help them reach their health goals with continuous reminders, insights and motivation. Now everyone has a personal health assistant to take care of their health 24X7.

_source.name: WDB India
_source.description:
WDB India Is an innovative and global service provider for pharmaceutical companies.
We believe and trust in quality work and timely deliverance of services.

_source.name: Wellness Solutions- My Life
_source.description: An integrated medicine center situated in The Garden City of India, Bangalore. They bring the most advanced technologies into natural and holistic methods of treatments. The suffering community of unhealthy people are being mismanaged by the 'Illness' industry. The present setup of hospitals are mainly doing disease care rather than health care. Now, it is possible to make the impossible happen by bringing preventive care into the front line of health care.

_source.name: Wiggles India
_source.description: Wiggles is India’s first tailor-made monthly preventive healthcare  subscription box “curated by vets for your pets” with an aim to disrupt the pet healthcare industry.

_source.name: 1tab
_source.description:
1Tab is the right place for all your healthcare needs with a wide range of medications, healthcare products, and services all across India. We Know Your Value.
You can:
Order medicines, healthcare products online
Book a consultation
Avail diagnostic services at Home

_source.name: AKKER BIO
_source.description: Akker Bio is India's first FMT (Fecal Microbial Transplantation) product and gut microbial farming company based out of Bangalore. We provide 100% safe microbiota, in the form of a Fecal Microbiota Transplant (FMT) doses & cultured commensals, to clinicians for administering to their patients. We developed custom processes to achieve great efficacy in our products. With state-of-the-art technology and processes, we change the way healthcare is delivered in future.

_source.name: APTACARE WELLNESS PRIVATE LIMITED
_source.description: Aptacare is India’s most trusted, leading Ayurveda firm which operates in key consumer product categories.  The main focus lays in Preventive health, Virtual consultation and R & D of various herb based preparations mentioned in our Ayurveda classics. This ayurvedic company has a wide distribution network covering many retail outlets with a huge penetration in both urban and rural markets.

_source.name: Ask DeeDee
_source.description: Ask DeeDee is a one-stop healthcare platform that allows women to anonymously ask sexual health questions and get accurate answers from experts quickly and conveniently. It was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Bangalore, Karnataka.

_source.name: Bare Anatomy
_source.description:
No two people are alike, neither are their personal care needs. You’re unique, you deserve unique care, too! They, at Bare Anatomy, like it precise, and they’re not okay with anything less than that. Hence, Personalization is the new way to Beauty!
‘Bare’ means without addition, something basic and simple, and ‘Anatomy’ means a study of the structure or internal workings of something. Both words share common grounds of being Natural, Pure in Form, Uncovered, Transparent and Fundamental.
Bare Anatomy celebrates and respects the most natural, unique, and the purest form of Individuals.
Bare Anatomy is a next-gen personal care and beauty brand for women. The team consists of very passionate and pedigreed individuals, who are alums of top schools like INSEAD (France), Carnegie Mellon University (CMU), National Institute of Fashion Technology (NIFT), Indian Institute of Technology (IIT), etc.
An out of the box and innovative concept, backed by advanced science and creativity makes Bare Anatomy a perfect balance of the heart and the mind! The company started with the aim of revolutionizing the personal care and beauty industry, starting with haircare products that include shampoos, hair oils, hair serums, and hair masks.

_source.name: BigOHealth
_source.description: BigOHealth is a free mobile application for patients and subscription based app for doctors that offers patients to get instant online appointment with doctors, mainly in tier 2 and tier 3 cities and a device for doctors that sync their no. of online and offline appointments.

_source.name: Charita Medcare
_source.description:
Charita Medcare connects international patients to accredited hospitals with expert doctors in India for affordable treatment. The Charita Medcare team, which is comprised of Stanford trained professionals and world-class surgeons, help patients find healthcare services at the right hospital. It enables patients to video consult with doctors in India from their home and once they are satisfied with the recommended treatment, Charita Medcare assists the patients in filing for a medical visa and travel to India.

The company was founded in 2019 by Karan Shetty and Melanie Rodrigues.

_source.name: Elate Wellbeing
_source.description:
Elate wellbeing an effort to make people happier and healthier. We believe there is no one right way and we need not go vegetarian or wake up too early and be a monk to be happier and healthier! Rather, we bring to you modern techniques (for both mental and physical well-being) which are easy to follow and can be easily incorporated while you juggle between your work, career and family! 

Elate provides online counseling, o meditation, therapies on how to sleep well, online yoga, and brain food.

_source.name: ePharma
_source.description: ePharma is the right place for all the pharmaceutical needs with a wide range of medications to order all across India. We provide a transparent platform to order prescribed medicine and health products from licensed pharmacies, book a consultation with the certified chain of doctors and diagnostic services at home from government authorized and certified labs.

_source.name: EvrCare
_source.description:
EvrCare’s mission is to take care of your parents when you move away. We intend to take care of all senior citizens who are living alone, starting with India.

EvrCare is the first platform in Asia that brings senior citizens and millenials to live together and share experiences. It matches those who are looking for affordable housing with senior citizens who have a spare room, and can get their rent reduced by up to 30% by helping out with household chores.

_source.name: Firdekho Health
_source.description: Firdekho Health is a digital health company that is empowered by the joint venture of manpower with cloud-based technology and HIPAA-compliance embarking a better lifestyle and healthcare for the people. Our operations are empathy-driven and with our platform, we make sure to help the healthcare system, its connected bodies and the patients with a better way to manage health by going beyond the precision along with freemium services.

_source.name: Green Box
_source.description: We strongly believe that care in food we consume can make all the difference. Hence, We as a "Green Box" aims at providing nutritional rich diet directly to your door step. Our specialized dietitians design the meal according to your nutritional goals.

_source.name: Healthspace
_source.description: Healthspace, is an integrated technology solution to manage all your healthcare needs. It helps patients in managing their health records securely and providing them access to their data and personalized health services, anytime and anywhere, especially when needed most. It helps doctors and healthcare providers connect more effectively with patients and improve their health outcomes.

_source.name: iMumz
_source.description:
Pruoo is helping expectant mothers to follow holistic practices for more joyful pregnancy with our Mobile App, iMumz. Our method, developed by experts of various life sciences, provides unique, personalized lifestyle recommendations to the to-be-moms. Pruoo encourages to follow the prescribed lifestyle, tracks the progress and shares with the respective doctors. 

This method has a strong impact on the wellbeing of the to-be-mom. Also, the baby in the fetus of an expectant mother has a similar ability to learn as an infant. This method will have a magical impact on the physical, mental and spiritual development of the unborn baby.

_source.name: Inneate Hub
_source.description: Inneate Hub operates one of its kind tech-enabled GPO for all procurement needs of a hospital. India has a $20 billion medical supplies industry, ailing from poor supply chain infrastructure and over-pricing. We understand that the ability of healthcare institutions to deliver quality affordable healthcare will come from strong backend value chain. At Inneate, we contribute towards this cause by working along the value chain of medical supplies to enable affordable patient care.

_source.name: Karmasthal Healthtech Private Limited
_source.description: We are a Super-specialty Elder care solutions at home dedicated to provide premium & comprehensive care, using a hybrid solution of both certified care givers and predictive human technology, for a constant care experience.

_source.name: Kucna Delivery Solution
_source.description: Kucna is-  healthcare aggregator that provide fastest healthcare products delivery to its customers.

_source.name: Mediflic
_source.description:
We are a medical tourism facilitator and a platform where medical travelers or patients coming from other cities or abroad can get informed about the best medical facilities available in India. We provide an all-in-one medical travel solution to the patients.

This is a one roof showroom of the entire Indian healthcare industry and the best platform to search for hospitals and doctors. Patients from all over the world can look out for their necessary medical treatment programs in India. We connect individuals with all the medical facilities that they need to take good care of themselves and their families.

Mediflic is an online healthcare service providing portal and medical tourism facilitator that acts as a bridge between the patients and the doctors. This medical health tourism company is centered around giving medical services at doorsteps to individuals everywhere throughout the world. On this portal, patient's medical records are put away on an encrypted and password protected cloud storage that can be accessed over the web 24 X 7. Patients can avail different medicinal services from top medical establishments and specialists in India.
Medical tourism facilitator Mediflic is here to make healthy living feasible for everybody. We want to make living healthy possible for people around the world. We bring world-class healthcare into our patients' homes and intend to make medical care progressively accessible, yet additionally moderate and accountable to our patients' needs. We have the vision to make all aspects of medicinal services available from anyplace, with improved access from your own cell phone/ tablet/ PC or laptop.
Presently, it is the best platform to search for hospitals and doctors, and aims to become a people care centric stage, wherein everybody easily gets to know about the vast opportunities of Indian healthcare services for their and their family's physical, psychological well-being.

_source.name: Mentalisa
_source.description: Mentalisa is a branch that emphasizes on expression and mental health and self care.

_source.name: Misters.in
_source.description: Misters.in is a Gurugram-based direct-to-customer health and wellness platform that more power to you. Anyway, they reckon that there's a lot of compensation and overcompensation for the lack of confidence that's going around.

_source.name: Myelin Foundry
_source.description: Myelin Foundry is a deep tech product start-up that transforms human experiences and industry outcomes by building Artificial Intelligence algorithms on video, voice, and sensor data for edge devices. The Myelin team has expertise in productising deep learning frameworks including CNNs, and GANs, with applications in Media & Entertainment, Health & Wellness, and National Security.

_source.name: Nutrafirst.in
_source.description:
Nutrafirst is a platform that offers you all the healthcare and nutrition-related products at one place and meets your health needs with premium quality products. Be it weight loss supplements, hair growth products, or any other vitamin and mineral supplements. We have been serving Indian markets for a long time and giving customers the value for the price. We manufacture products keeping customers perspective in mind and deliver optimal health results by offering full customer support.

Nutrafirst provides ample health solutions to keep you agile throughout a day. Its health products have the potential to reenergize the exhausted body organs and alleviate the risk of diseases simultaneously.

_source.name: OmRx
ON Organic & Natural
_source.description: ON is a movement that endeavours to aspire people to become a part of it for better health, better lifestyle and overall wellness.

_source.name: OneGen Healthcare
_source.description:
OneGen Healthcare - Quality and Affordable Healthcare to Everyone and Everywhere. At OneGen we believe Customers should have complete awareness and freedom to Choose what's good for them and their family.
We are aggregators, connects patients to Doctors and Local pharmacies. Creates one shop solution for complete treatment and well being at an affordable cost.

_source.name: Ornale.com
_source.description: Ornale is your trusted source for all things fitness. Ornale is a data-driven online Discovery platform for the fitness community in India. We aggregate about 4,000 fitness centers and more than 2000 fitness professionals from 10 cities across India.

_source.name: OVO Health Pvt. Ltd.
_source.description: OVO Health is the fastest growing healthcare facilitator dealing in multispeciality treatments like Cosmetic Surgeries, Cancer and Fertility. OVO Guarantees to get you the best treatment possible well within your budget and from the most experienced doctors in its network. OVO's mission is to help patients with unbiased transparent information across healthcare and assist with Trusted and Transparent information. OVO is known for its Independence, Authority and strong Patient Feedback. OVO Health is there with you through your entire journey making your Dream a Reality.

_source.description: ScienceHook is all about awesome science stuffs covering a vast majority of science fields - AI, Nanotechnology, Space, Environment, Medical, Mathematics, Engineering, Quantum World, Neuroscience and many more.

_source.name: Senescent Care
_source.description: Senescent care is a continent and pocket friendly Home health care service providers available online. Either you are looking to book a nany for your new born baby or a nurse for your grandparents we are just a click away.

_source.name: Sumanchna Springedge Healthcare
_source.description: A leading private sector healthcare provider in Asia. It has a robust presence across the healthcare ecosystem ...

_source.name: 5th Vital
_source.description: 5th Vital’s On-Door sample collection services provide you the flexibility of calling phlebotomists to your home, office or any other address at your preferred time. Their phlebotomists are equipped with the latest technology equipment and the samples are processed in their state-of-the-art technologically equipped laboratory. All their staff is highly experienced and trained to ensure the best quality services to our customers.

_source.name: Aadar
_source.description: Aadar is an Ayurveda Healthcare company building in-house natural and effective products. Ayurveda is a rich tradition that goes back to thousands of years. We all have witnessed the miracles of ayurveda in our juvenile age when our elders used various natural ingredients from their backyard to safeguard us from various lifestyle problems. The story of AADAR goes back to three decades when a grandmother (also a vaidya) devised few ayurveda formulations using all natural herbs to tackle issues such as indigestion, blood sugar etc. in the family.

_source.name: AB Hospitals
_source.description: AB Lifecare is a Healthcare Technology company with an aim to make effective, efficient, equitable surgical care accessible to all. It develops, markets and operates surgical centres under Anand Bhaav Hospitals (ABH). Using its proprietary clinical workflow technology, it offers upto 60-70% operating cost savings on surgical treatments. Our focus area is elective surgeries like Gallbladder Removal, Hernia Repair, Haemorrhoidectomy, Piles, Uterus Removal, Hysterectomy, Fibroids and Biopsy.

_source.name: ABC of Parenting
_source.description: ABC of Parenting - A leading content platform for the new age parents guiding them through all stage of your motherhood journey - getting pregnant, during pregnancy, post-pregnancy.

_source.name: abhieo
_source.description: abhieo is a leading financial online matchmaking platform founded with a vision to fulfill every financial aspiration in the safe, simple and speediest way possible through a wide range of loan ,Investment & insurance products.

_source.name: Acroalias
_source.description: Acroalias Technologies is company moving towards future with the aim of fixing the social healthcare problems with algorithms using various technologies which could save and benifit lives with unique possiblities.

exits.description: KiviHealth is a health-tech startup that aims to provide an affordable, patient-centric, digital health information management system.

_source.name: HealthStart
_source.description:
HealthStart is India's first accelerator program dedicated to support start ups in healthcare industry through funding, mentorship and other requisite support. Healthstart has been founded by a team of highly successful group of global professionals comprising of entrepreneurs, business executives and investment professionals with the sole aim - to stimulate much needed healthcare entrepreneurship. HealthStart model of active mentorship through a dedicated curriculum, industry focus and active support from industry experts are key differentiators in the Indian venture capital ecosystem.

HealthStart has 2 different funding programs, incubation program & angels investment.

exits.description: Kensho combines natural language search, graphical user interfaces, and secure cloud computing to create a new class of analytics tools
RiskRecon is a leading third-party/vendor cyber risk solutions provider
Beam Therapeutics is pioneering the use of CRISPR base editing to develop precision genetic medicines that treat disease.
Denali Therapeutics is a biotechnology company.
Innovent Biologics is a biopharmaceutical company developing and manufacturing monoclonal antibodies.
Orchard Therapeutics is a biotechnology company dedicated to transforming the lives of patients through innovative gene therapies.
Precision BioSciences is a biotechnology company dedicated to improving life.
Mersana Therapeutics develops a biodegradable polymer platform Fleximer® which creates new and better medicines.
ViewRay develops advanced radiation therapy technology for the treatment of cancer.
Apellis Pharmaceuticals focuses on developing novel therapeutics and drug delivery technologies to address chronic inflammatory diseases.

_source.name: F-Prime Capital
_source.description:
F-Prime's roots are in one of America’s great entrepreneurial success stories. Fidelity Investments was founded in 1946 and grew from a single mutual fund into one of the largest asset management firms in the world, with over $2 trillion in assets under management. For the last forty years, this venture capital group has had the privilege of backing other great entrepreneurs as they built ground-breaking companies in technology and life sciences, including Atari, MCI, ROLM Corp., Alibaba, Ironwood Pharmaceuticals, and Ultragenyx.

Today, F-Prime's funds are larger and more global, but its teams are still small and local. F-Prime stays true to its entrepreneurial roots. In the US and Europe, F-Prime Capital Partners is investing in healthcare (formerly Fidelity Biosciences) and in technology (formerly part of Devonshire Investors). In other geographies, its sister fund is called Eight Roads (formerly Fidelity Growth Partners), with investment teams in London, Shanghai, Beijing, Hong Kong, Tokyo, and Mumbai. 

Together F-Prime brings a world of insight, domain expertise and relationships to support entrepreneurs. Without the pressure of fundraising from outside investors, F-Prime Capital Partners focuses all of its time finding and helping great entrepreneurs build important companies.

exits.description: OnlineTyari is India's leading online platform providing complete solution for online preparation for different competitive exams

_source.name: Rajasthan Patrika Pvt. Ltd.
_source.description:
Rajasthan Patrika () is a leading Hindi Newspaper of India â€“ brings you the latest news online from india and around the world in hindi. It is published from 8 states of India include Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh, Chhattisgarh, Karnataka, Gujrat, Tamilnadu, West Bengal and Delhi. It has total 35 editions published from Jaipur, Jodhpur, Udaipur, Kota and other cities of Rajasthan and from major Indian cities such as Bhopal, Indore, Ahmedabad, Gwalior, Kolkata , Jabalpur and Bangalore. Late Shri "Karpoor Chandra Kulish founded Rajasthan Patrika on 7 March 1956.

The Rajasthan Patrika online website carries latest news, breaking news headlines, daily news, local news on bollywood, politics, education, sports, business, national, international, health, lifestyle, fashion, entertainment and more.

_source.name: Brinc
_source.description: Brinc is a different breed of venture capital and accelerator firm. Core to our business is our belief that some of the world’s biggest challenges can be solved by entrepreneurs, who we like to call GAME CHANGERS. More game changers will make a positive impact on the world if they are given the right backing. And that’s what we’re here for. To support and mentor founders and their teams from across the world and provide investment to help them grow. Today, we believe that technology focused startups, with the right backing and support can fundamentally change how we move, what we eat, how we feel and where we live for the better. Learn more: https://www.brinc.io/

exits.description: BlueJeans offers interactive, multi-directional video communication services through a cloud-based platform.
Plaid provides companies the tools and access needed for the development of a digitally-enabled financial system.
Motif allows individuals and investment advisors to invest in stock and bond portfolios built around everyday ideas and economic trends.
Casper is a sleep startup that launches a comfortable mattress sold directly to consumers, eliminating commission ­driven, inflated prices.
CyberX is the most robust cybersecurity platform for continuously reducing IoT/OT risks.
Jet operates an e-commerce platform that allows its member to shop online from various retailers.
FireEye is an intelligence-led security company that protects customers with innovative technology and expertise from the front lines.
Lending Club is an online financial community that brings together creditworthy borrowers and savvy investors.
MobileIron manufactures Mobile Device Management solutions (MDM) and Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) for mobile devices.
Shape provides defense against malicious automated cyber-attacks on web and mobile applications.

_source.name: Norwest Venture Partners
_source.description: Norwest is a premier multi-stage investment firm managing more than $7.5 billion in capital. Since our inception, we have invested in more than 600 companies and partner with over 140 active companies across our venture and growth equity portfolio. The firm invests in early to late stage companies across a wide range of sectors with a focus on consumer, enterprise, and healthcare. We offer a deep network of connections, operating experience, and a wide range of impactful services to help CEOs and founders scale their businesses. Norwest has offices in Palo Alto and San Francisco, with subsidiaries in India and Israel.

_source.name: Apollo Hospitals Enterprise
_source.description: Apollo Hospitals is widely recognized as the pioneer of private healthcare in India, and was the countryâ€™s first corporate hospital. The Apollo Hospitals Group, which started as a 150-bed hospital and today, operates 9200 beds across 64 hospitals. A forerunner in integrated healthcare, Apollo has a robust presence across the healthcare spectrum. The Group has emerged as the foremost integrated healthcare provider in Asia, with mature group companies that specialize in insurance, pharmacy, consultancy, clinics and many such key touch points of the ecosystem. The Apollo Group has touched the lives of over 45 million patients, from 121 countries.

exits.description: The Learning Corp is a next-gen digital therapeutics company and maker of mobile cognitive therapy platform Constant Therapy
WiseBanyan is the next generation financial services firm, helping people save & invest for goals, starting with their first $1 -- for free.
Spensa offers painless, cost-effective precision pest management tools for modern agriculture.
1DocWay is an online platform enabling patients to schedule appointments and see their doctors through video chat.
TruClinic is a modular cloud-based  telemedicine platform.

_source.name: VilCap Investments
_source.description: VilCap Investments leverages the experience of the Village Capital accelerator programs to find, train, and fund entrepreneurs. They make seed and follow-on investments in peer-selected companies in agriculture, education, energy, financial services, and health around the globe.

exits.description: CrowdSpark is an all-in-one solution for brands and media companies to gather, curate, publish and analyze user-generated content.
Ticket exchange company with flexible name-your-price buying and risk-free selling. No wasted time, no wasted tickets.
Travel Notes helps financial institutions improve their cardholders’ experience when they are traveling.

_source.name: UpTech Accelerator
_source.description: UpTech is a nationally ranked tech accelerator program for data-driven startups that are developing tech-enabled solutions and seeking equity funding. UpTech selects up to 10 startups annually to go through the 6-month accelerator program driven by intensive entrepreneurship education, one-on-one mentoring, and extensive community involvement.

exits.description: Flyrobe is an on-demand apparel rental platform that provides premium designer wear.
Raksul is a B2B platform builder with a vision of "better systems, better world". It has platforms in printing, logistics and advertising.
Luxola is an online destination offering skincare and cosmetic products for consumers in South Asia.
GENIEE (TYO6562, A Member of SoftBank Group) is APAC Digital Marketing Technology and Advertising Technology Company.
Smart camp is a company that provides Internet services for B2B marketing.
Pie offers a web-based application that enables individuals and teams to message at their workplaces.
UrbanIndo is an Indonesian property portal connecting property agents and sellers with buyers.
aucfan is a Japanese online platform that provides e-commerce price data across American, Chinese, and Japanese markets.
Somewrite aims to transform advertising into valuable information for the end consumer.
PriceArea is a price and product search engine connecting shoppers with local and retail stores, and other online marketplaces.

_source.name: STRIVE
_source.description: STRIVE focuses on investing in early stage (seed to Series A) internet and mobile companies. It seeks out companies in Japan, Southeast Asia, and India with top notch management teams and strong market potential. It is not tied to strategic investments for GREE Inc. and leverages its pan-Asia expertise for guiding its portfolio in an engaged, hands-on role.

exits.description: Kakao is a mobile lifestyle platform offering services ranging from messaging, news, advertising, gaming, e-commerce, and music.
One Medical is a members-only technology platform offering an array of concierge medical services.
1mg is an online pharmacy network platform and generic medicine engine.
Castlight Health navigation platform makes it as easy as humanly possible to navigate healthcare & live happier more productive lives.
Youku is a video-sharing website that enables users to search, view, and share high-quality video content across multiple devices.
Groupon is a deal-of-the-day website that offers discounted gift certificates usable at local or national companies.

Pacific Biosciences designs, develops, and manufactures sequencing systems to resolve genetically complex problems.
BlueTalon provides leading data-centric security along with visibility and control at the data layer across Hadoop, Spark, SQL and Big Data

_source.name: Maverick Ventures
_source.description:
Maverick Ventures is a registered investment advisor managing private investment funds for qualified investors. The company focused on an agile team of venture partners and the resources, reputation, and relationships of a multi-billion dollar fund. It also invests through an evergreen structure that allows us to support entrepreneurs for an indefinite time horizon.

Maverick Ventures also invests in early-stage companies such as software development, medical devices, biotech, pharmaceutical, technology, and digital marketing sectors.  The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in San Francisco, CA, USA.

_source.name: Talwalkars
_source.description: Talwalkars Better Value Fitness Limited., more popularly known as Talwalkars, is India's largest chain of gyms, healthclubs & spas. It has more than 150 ultra modern branches across 80 cities of India with over 1,50,000 members. A healthy body is the perfect compliment to a brilliant mind. Building a strong masculine physique or a graceful feminine figure, Talwalkars has been spreading fitness since 1932 across India. A team of qualified fitness instructors, medical specialists, and the latest international equipment synergise to give you the best fitness experience in the country.

_source.name: Manipal Group
_source.description: Manipal Education and Medical Group (MEMG) are one of Indiaâ€™s medical research, education, and healthcare service providers. It manages hospitals, education institutions, and medical research facilities.

_source.name: LGT Lightstone
_source.description: LGT Lightstone is a global direct private equity platform focused on impact investing in scalable businesses that achieve positive societal outcomes by harnessing breakthrough developments in technology. LGT Lightstone invests in companies in Europe, Asia, Latin America and Africa that empower consumers, increase business productivity, and promote sustainable resource utilization. LGT Lightstone is part of LGT Group, a leading international private banking and asset management group that has been fully controlled by the Liechtenstein Princely Family for over 80 years.

exits.description: Square is a merchant services aggregator and mobile payment company that aims to simplify commerce through technology.

RingCentral, a global distributor of cloud-unified communications and collaboration solutions, offers its users with technology services.
The leader in unstructured data management in the cloud.

Cylance is a global provider of cybersecurity products and services using A.I. and machine learning to solve security problems.
Granular is a software and analytics platform that helps farmers operate more efficiently and make better business decisions.
Yammer is an enterprise social network that enables employees to collaborate across departments, geographies and business applications.
Guardant Health is committed to positively and significantly impacting patient health through technology breakthroughs in oncology.

_source.name: Khosla Ventures
_source.description:
Khosla Ventures is a venture capital firm started in 2004 by Vinod Khosla, Co-Founder of Sun Microsystems. The firm provides venture assistance and strategic advice to entrepreneurs working on breakthrough technologies.

With over $5 Billion under management, the firm focuses on a range of areas including consumer, enterprise, education, advertising, financial services, semiconductors, health, big data, agriculture, food, sustainable energy, and robotics. Khosla Ventures is headquartered in Menlo Park, California.

_source.name: Dabur India
_source.description:
Dabur India Ltd is one of India’s leading FMCG Companies with Revenues of over Rs 7,806.4 Crore & Market Capitalisation of US $5 Billion. Building on a legacy of quality and experience of over 131 years, Dabur is today India’s most trusted name and the world’s largest Ayurvedic and Natural Health Care Company. 

Dabur India is also a world leader in Ayurveda with a portfolio of over 250 Herbal/Ayurvedic products. Dabur's FMCG portfolio today includes five flagship brands with distinct brand identities -- Dabur as the master brand for natural healthcare products, Vatika for premium personal care, Hajmola for digestives, Réal for fruit juices and beverages and Fem for fairness bleaches and skin care products.

Dabur today operates in key consumer products categories like Hair Care, Oral Care, Health Care, Skin Care, Home Care and Foods. The company has a wide distribution network, covering over 5.8 million retail outlets with a high penetration in both urban and rural markets.

Dabur's products also have a huge presence in the overseas markets and are today available in over 60 countries across the globe. Its brands are highly popular in the Middle East, SAARC countries, Africa, US, Europe and Russia. Dabur's overseas revenue today accounts for over 30% of the total turnover..

The 130-year-old company, promoted by the Burman family, had started operations in 1884 as an Ayurvedic medicines company. From its humble beginnings in the bylanes of Calcutta, Dabur India Ltd has come a long way today to become one of the biggest Indian-owned consumer goods companies with the largest herbal and natural product portfolio in the world. Overall, Dabur has successfully transformed itself from being a family-run business to become a professionally managed enterprise. What sets Dabur apart from the crowd is its ability to change ahead of others and to always set new standards in corporate governance & innovation.

_source.name: YouCare
_source.description:
YouCare is a Chandigarh based healthcare startup connecting families to awesome caregivers. 

With over 200 nurses, medical attendants, nannies and babysitters registered, we assist families to search for babysitting, nanny and elderly care services in Chandigarh.

With YouCare, families can now shortlist caregivers on the basis of location, requirement and budget. They can book online to schedule direct interviews with the caregivers and hire them in an instant.

By letting caregivers determine their requirement and wages, YouCare lets caregivers work for as many hours as they want, negotiate their own charges and fix their own timings. YouCare.in also offers to train caregivers to help them climb up the social ladder and gain better dignity for their work.

You can visit us at: https://youcare.in to know more.

Team:

Having experienced the challenges of Urban living the team is on a mission to create solutions that address challenges in the  Urban health, safety and convenience domains.

_source.name: Brainpan Innovations
_source.description: 1. Doctor’s Diary: Doctor's Diary is a Data Driven Preventive Electronic Health Record (EHR) application that promises ‘one patient, one record’ for 1.31+ billion Indian population. Doctor’s Diary facilitates a holistic understanding of each patient’s health, minimizes human errors, prevents wrong diagnosis and helps the doctor make a more informed decisio. BIPL has also developed Disease Atlas which is an early warning system for epidemics and pandemics. It predicts and monitors the future wave of contagious outbreaks. It has the potential to save millions of lives from diseases like dengue, malaria, cholera, typhoid, and influenza.

_source.name: Brightsandz Technologies LLP
_source.description:
Electromagnetic pollution is the most significant form of pollution generated by human activity in this century - all the more dangerous because it is invisible and insensible. In June 2011, the World Health Organization deemed Radio frequency radiation as a "possible Carcinogen" in the same league as Lead, Vehicle fumes, Chloroform etc.
Brightsandz is a radiation consultancy that acknowledges the risks of EMF and EMF radiation pollution - at home, schools, outdoors and at work place. We carry out radiation audits of premises and provide solutions to reduce EMF and EMF radiation for a a healthy and safe living. Even while the scientific community is split on the adverse effects and the no effects of ElectroMagnetic radiation, we believe that it is safe than to be sorry.

_source.name: CaringElders Technology
_source.description:
Caring Elders Technology Private Ltd (CET) is a Health Care IT Solutions company focused on offering a cloud based system for Home Health Agencies, Outpatient Clinics, Nursing Homes, Labs and Hospitals. CET has a subscription based SaaS system that specifically targets evolving Home Care Agencies and other Health Care providers in India at affordable prices. The System is designed using seasoned U.S. Health IT professionals with local market contexts in mind.

     Doctors, Nurses, Therapists and associated office staff can use our solutions to meet their respective workflow needs like Patient registration, Scheduling and Clinical Documentation. Our Solution works on multiple devices like PCs, Laptops and Tablets. Patient portal and Mobile apps are coming soon. Thus, we eliminate the need for huge upfront system costs since our licensing is based on monthly subscription. Customers can start with few users and scale up based on their needs.

     Our goal is to help health care providers deliver effective care by managing their system needs. Our solutions will continue to evolve based on the needs of the health care industry in India. You can contact us at sales@caringlelders.com for a Demo or a free trial. Also, you can visit us at www.CaringElders.com for additional information.

_source.name: Celes Care
_source.description: Celes Care is India’s first Online Health Clinic for Women. We offer doctor consultation services on Pregnancy Care, Nutrition, Wellness & General Health. Our online consultation service is highly affordable and delivered by our expert women doctors who are compassionate and care for your health. We connect you with our doctors within a minute.

_source.name: Clinicia
_source.description: Clinicia is Practice Management Solutions for Specialist Doctors. It helps Doctors manage their Patients & Clinic in more efficient manner. Its mobile App & Desktop based software solution. Clinicia aims to convert Clinics to paperless with Online Records management. It also helps improve the engagement between Patients & Doctors.

_source.name: Cooey Technologies
_source.description:
Cooey Technologies provides smart & leverage the power of technology to power transformation in healthcare.

Cooey was founded in April 2015 by Manu Madhusudanan and Prabhakaran T.P. , after they had first-hand experience of what many chronic patients go through in India. Cooey aims to be known the “WhatsApp” of healthcare or digital real estate where everyone is hooked in and get effective answers in the simplest form possible.

An overwhelming percentage of chronically ill, elderly patients go through the painful process of logging their homecare medical data & availing recurring services. Further, there is lack of mechanism to capture comprehensive medical history or service targeting for hospital. And you need solutions that are dynamic, holistic, personalized, and more importantly easily understandable.

With Cooey’s solution, patients can minimize their visits to hospitals or labs and get personalized insights on their medical condition while staying connected with their doctors. Thus, empowering them to make informed decisions on their medical condition.

So far, the Health IT includes Hospital Information System (HIS) and other products/apps, but still there is a missing last mile link, engagement with patient. Cooey is that missing shoe in this entire process. It’s the 3rd platform for chronic patient health management. 3rd Platform is about engaging patients to health management system and providing targeted services to them.

To maximize the opportunities further in elderly care & remote monitoring, in December 2016, Cooey launched its next product, MyCooey, a comprehensive platform exclusively for elderly care management and remote care coordination. It connects patients, caregivers, and family members irrespective of the location they are in. It’s a combination of smart devices, mobile apps and a web portal. MyCooey has now close to 40,000 patients and caregivers as users across the globe, and demonstrated how one can leverage best practices and enable better patient engagement, more effective communication and care coordination among the patient community and caregivers.
